name: BOM Stock Report
query:
SELECT 
	bom_item.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:200",
	ROUND(bom_item.qty,2) as "Required Qty:Float:100",
	ROUND(SUM(ifnull(ledger.actual_qty,0)),2) as "In Stock Qty:Float:100",
	FLOOR(SUM(ifnull(ledger.actual_qty,0))/bom_item.qty) as "Enough Parts to Build:Int:100"
FROM
	`tabBOM Item` AS bom_item 
	LEFT JOIN `tabStock Ledger Entry` AS ledger	
	ON bom_item.item_code = ledger.item_code 
WHERE
	bom_item.parent=%(bom)s

GROUP BY bom_item.item_code
